title: Wonderful neighborhood
text: In sight of the Acropolis, there is the Plaka, old, vibrant and charming neighborhood. Alleys, stores, restaurants and antiquities will give you a perfect evening.

title: Marvelous
text: The heart of Athens and the birth place of western civilization. Beautiful temples. Don’t miss the fist theater

title: Great!
text: It’s a wonderful tour with a great guide. Athens is suitable for segaway. Very nice views. We did it in the afternoon, it’s a good time.
